channel.title: Doubled Light Sabers -RELEASED- -Ints and all!
channel.description:
Please Comment Tell me what you think! - this model was made by - Qoodscape - Enjoy -
http://uppit.com/v/CK6WJG5X - red wield
http://uppit.com/v/MXNLOSWM - purple wield
http://uppit.com/v/IRX0QFUT - blue wield
http://uppit.com/v/4R0YGWTG - drop model for all!
PICTURE OF 1 (JUST IMAGINE IT IN THE DIFF COLORS!!!)
[IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/153b5g4.jpg[/img]
ints for red light saber (doubled)
[code]if(i == 12333) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 13623; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 12333; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 12333; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Double Red Light Saber"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "2 Light Sabers!".getBytes(); // Item Examine }[/code]
ints for Blue Light Saber (Doubled)
[code]if(i == 12999) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 13623; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 12999; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 12999; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Double Blue Light Saber"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "2 Light Sabers!".getBytes(); // Item Examine }[/code]
Ints For Purple Light Saber (Doubled)
[code]if(i == 12639) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 13623; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 12639; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 12639; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Double Purple Light Saber"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "2 Light Sabers!".getBytes(); // Item Examine }[/code]
___________________________________________________________________________________________ All Credits to Me QoodScape Took Me 1 hour to make =] ___________________________________________________________________________________________

qoodscape:

Please Comment Tell me what you think! - this model was made by - Qoodscape - Enjoy -

I was looking forward to something Epic, but to me, it’s just a solid rod, nothing else. Glow takes what, 10 seconds to make, so can you rename them to Painted Sticks?

Read full topic

item.title: Doubled Light Sabers -RELEASED- -Ints and all!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

qoodscape:

are you kidding? ive never seen doubled light sabers ever believe me they are mine

The reason you have not seen them is because nobody really wants them. The reason nobody wants them is because you can easily find them. Mayby not dual, but lightsabers in general can be found simply. Same with a dragon platebody. Its just one of those common items.

Read full topic

item.title: Doubled Light Sabers -RELEASED- -Ints and all!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Alright im not gonna say its complete shit, but it is far over-done. We can find these in clients all over, with correct ints. So who is to say you acually created these?

[quote=“rip4d, post:14, topic:293978”][quote author=qoodscape link=topic=388915.msg2908157#msg2908157 date=1249924660]
Lol Guys Whoever said that is 100% dumb lol dylan is 10 times better then me and i respect his critisism because it only makes me better so thanks daniel but you got any comments like how to have it have the effect? thanks
[/quote]
lol’d[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2009, 09:39:12 pm[/size][hr]You do realize that the light sabres must be seperste models right? If not, the seconds will move the same time as the first. Making the animation shitty.[/quote]
Hmm, no your acually wrong, apply the “glove” animation and and it will be animated correctly. Thats a quick fix for that small issue aint it?

Read full topic

item.title: Doubled Light Sabers -RELEASED- -Ints and all!
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“Archer, post:16, topic:293978”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=388915.msg2906860#msg2906860 date=1249851990]

funny thing is, if you spent 5 more minutes on them you could have created a glow illusion.
1/5 for rushing, doing something done hundreds of times and not making it unique =/

wow dude that was so uncalled for…you dont even know if he wanted them to glow

uncalled for how? your reply is more uncalled for. a lightsabre is a BEAM a beam would have a glow, even if he only added slight. look at that: its a solid rod, theres not even a slight visible transparency which would take 5 seconds to add. You should think before you post, cuz u just made yourself look stupid =) i gave my criticism, and you have no right to tell me its uncalled for.
[/quote]

If a lightsaber does not glow, it is not a lightsaber.[/quote]

This. Hence I said this model is shit.

Read full topic

1/5 for rushing, doing something done hundreds of times and not making it unique =/

wow dude that was so uncalled for…you dont even know if he wanted them to glow

uncalled for how? your reply is more uncalled for. a lightsabre is a BEAM a beam would have a glow, even if he only added slight. look at that: its a solid rod, theres not even a slight visible transparency which would take 5 seconds to add. You should think before you post, cuz u just made yourself look stupid =) i gave my criticism, and you have no right to tell me its uncalled for.[/quote]

If a lightsaber does not glow, it is not a lightsaber.
